link_multiple.expression:
create table #account_server_tmp(account_id int, name nvarchar(128), description nvarchar(256) null, email_address nvarchar(128) null, display_name nvarchar(128) null, replyto_address nvarchar(128) null, servertype nvarchar(128), servername nvarchar(128), port int, username nvarchar(128) null, use_default_credentials bit, enable_ssl bit) declare @AccountName sysname
declare crs cursor local fast_forward for ( {0} ) open crs fetch crs into @AccountName while @@fetch_status >= 0 begin insert #account_server_tmp(account_id, name, description, email_address, display_name, replyto_address, servertype, servername, port, username, use_default_credentials, enable_ssl) exec msdb.dbo.sysmail_help_account_sp @account_name=@AccountName fetch crs into @AccountName end close crs deallocate crs
